Text:
{d}en-lil₂ gu-ti-um{ki} muš-ŋiri₂ hur-saŋ-ŋa₂ lu₂ a₂\abs zig₃-ga diŋir-re-e-ne\gen lu₂ nam-lugal ki-en-gi-ra₂\abs kur-še₃ ba-de₆-a ki-en-gi-ra₂
5al2 niŋ₂-a-erim₂\abs bi₂-in-si-a dam\abs tuku\com dam-ni\abs ba-an-da-kar-ra dumu\abs tuku\com dumu-ni\abs ba-an-da-kar-ra niŋ₂-a-erim₂ niŋ₂-a₂-zig₃\abs kalam-ma\l1 mi-ni-in-ŋar-ra\gen {d}en-lil₂ lugal kur-kur-ra-ke₄ mu-bi\abs ha-lam-e-de₃ {d}utu-he₂-ŋal₂ nita kalag-ga lugal unug{ki}-ga lugal an-ub-da limmu₅-ba lugal dug₄-ga-na
5al2 nu-gi₄-gi₄-da\com {d}en-lil₂ lugal kur-kur-ra-ke₄ a₂-bi\abs mu-da-an-aŋ₂ {d}inana nin-a-ni\dat mu-na-an-ŋen\v14sg3s šud₃\abs mu-na-ra₂ nin-ŋu₁₀ piriŋ me₃\gen kur-kur-da du₇-du₇ {d}en-lil₂-le nam-lugal ki-en-gi-ra\abs šu-ba
5al2 gi₄-gi₄-de₃ a₂-bi\abs mu-da-an-aŋ₂\v6sg1 a₂-dah-ŋu₁₀\abs he₂-me\v14sg2s ugnim lu₂ kur₂-kur₂-ra\gen\abs ki\l3 he₂-eb₂-us₂-us₂\v11bl3\v14sg3s ti-ri₂-ga-a-an lugal gu-ti-um{ki}-ke₄ ka-bi\abs ba-ši-ba lu₂\abs nu-mu-ši-e₃\v14sg3s {id₂}idigna gu₂ min-a-ba
5al2 bi₂-in-tuš sig-še₃ ki-en-gi-ra₂
5al2 gana₂\abs bi₂-keše₂ igi-nim-še₃ ŋiri₃\abs i₃-keše₂ kaskal kalam-ma-ke₄
5el3 u₂ gid₂-da\abs bi₂-in-mu₂\v10l3 lugal {d}en-lil₂-le a₂\abs šum₂-ma {d}inana-ke₄ šag₄-ge
5el3 pad₃-da {d}utu-he₂-ŋal₂ nita kalag-ga unug{ki}-ta mu-ši-e₃\v14sg3s e₂ {d}iškur-ka\gen\l2 ŋeš\abs bi₂-du₃ dumu iri-na-ke₄-ne\dat gu₃\abs mu-ne-de₂-e gu-ti-um{ki}\abs {d}en-lil₂-le ma-an-šum₂ nin-ŋu₁₀ {d}inana\abs a₂-dah-ŋu₁₀-um {d}dumu-zid-ama-ušum-gal-an-na-ke₄ nam-ŋu₁₀\abs bi₂-dug₄ {d}bil₄-ga-meš₃ dumu {d}nin-sumun₂-na-ke₄\abs maškim-še₃ ma-an-šum₂ dumu unug{ki}-ga dumu kul-aba₄{ki}-ra šag₄ hul₂-la\l1 ba-an-ŋar\v14sg3s iri-ni\abs lu₂ aš-gin₇ eŋir-ra-ne₂
5el3 ba-ab-us₂\v11bl3\v14sg3s zu₂-keše₂ igi\abs bar-ra\l3 si\abs bi₂-sa₂ e₂ {d}iškur-ka\gen\l1 zig₃-ga-ne₂
5el3 ud limmu₅-kam-ma\l1 kab₂-su id₂-en-urin-gal-ka
5al2 ŋeš\abs bi₂-du₃ ud ia₂-kam-ma\l1 barag i₃-li₂-tab-ba-e-ka\gen
5al2 ŋeš\abs bi₂-du₃ ur-{d}nin-a-zu na-bi-{d}en-lil₂ šagina ti-ri₂-ga-a-an\gen ki-en-gi-še₃ kiŋ₂-gi₄-a im-gi₄-eš in-dab₅-dab₅ šu-ba\l1 ŋeš\abs ni-ŋar barag i₃-li₂-tab-ba-e-ka\gen\l1 zig₃-ga-ne₂
5el3 ud aš₃-kam-ma\l1 {ka}karkara{ki}-ka
5al2 ŋeš\abs bi₂-du₃ {d}iškur-ra mu-na-an-ŋen\v14sg3s šud₃\abs mu-na-ra₂ {d}iškur\abs {ŋeš}tukul\abs {d}en-lil₂-le ma-an-šum₂ a₂-dah-ŋu₁₀\abs he₂-me\v14sg2s šag₄ ŋi₆-ba-ka x im-ma-an-x igi-nim adab{ki}\gen\l1 {d}utu e₃-a-ra mu-na-an-ŋen\v14sg3s šud₃\abs mu-na-ra₂ {d}utu\abs gu-ti-um{ki}\abs {d}en-lil₂-le ma-an-šum₂ a₂-dah-ŋu₁₀\abs he₂-me\v14sg2s ki-bi bar gu-ti-um{ki}\gen ŋeš\abs mu-na-par₃ erin₂\abs mu-na-lah₅ {d}utu-he₂-ŋal₂ nita kalag-ga aga₃-kar₂\abs im-mi-sig₁₀ šagina-bi\com ud-ba ti-ri₂-ga-a-an lugal gu-ti-um{ki}\gen\abs dili-a-ne₂ ŋiri₃\abs ba-da-an-kar ki zi-ni\abs ba-da-an-kar-ra dab₄-ru-um{ki}-ma ba-an-sag₉\v14sg3s lu₂ dab₄-ru-um{ki}-ma-ke₄ {d}utu-he₂-ŋal₂\abs bar lugal {d}en-lil₂-le a₂\abs šum₂-ma\abs i₃-me-a\abs i₃-zu-a-ke₄-eš ti-ri₂-ga-a-an-ra\l2 šu\abs nu-ni-ba {lu₂}kiŋ₂-gi₄-a {d}utu-he₂-ŋal₂\gen\erg ti-ri₂-ga-a-an u₃ dam dumu-ni\abs dab₄-ru-um{ki}-ma mu-un-dab₅ šu-na
5al2 ŋeš\abs bi₂-ŋar igi-na
5al2 tug₂\abs bi₂-si {d}utu-he₂-ŋal₂\erg igi {d}utu-še₃ ŋiri₃-ni-še₃ mu-nu₂ gu₂-na ŋiri₃\abs bi₂-gub gu-ti-um{ki} muš-ŋiri₂ hur-saŋ-ŋa₂\abs ki-in-dar-a bi₂-naŋ X x X ŋeš\abs bi₂-X X ma₂-gid₂\abs zag-ba\l1 im-ta-ŋar nam-lugal ki-en-gi-ra\abs šu-ba
5al2 im-mi-gi₄
